pullrequest.title: fix Link::AddTorque for Simbody and Bullet, with test

content.raw:
I agree for pure couples, but apparently If I want to add a wrench (force-moment) to a link in Gazebo I have to jointly use the functions `AddForce` and `AddTorque`.

In this case the angular part of the wrench (the one that I will pass to `AddTorque`) will depend on the point with respect to which I am expressing the wrench, while the linear part (the  "force") will be expression point indipendent.
content.html:
I agree for pure couples, but apparently If I want to add a wrench (force-moment) to a link in Gazebo I have to jointly use the functions AddForce and AddTorque.

In this case the angular part of the wrench (the one that I will pass to AddTorque) will depend on the point with respect to which I am expressing the wrench, while the linear part (the "force") will be expression point indipendent.
